page.title: 18LEISURE
page.content: In our survey of how people use their leisure time in our area it was found that many people go to clubs, theatres and cinemas, and attend concerts. Most people do not play a sport but some sports which people play include skiing, hockey, badminton and swimming.People's hobbies include knitting, do-it-yourself house care,car maintenance, sewing, gardening,home decorating, walking,reading,cooking and singing in a choir. Most people watch between 1 and 3 hours of T.V each day and enjoy serials news, current affairs, sport, plays, and films best.The most popular newspapers are the local papers like the Huddersfield Examiner, the Holme Valley Express and the Yorkshire Post.Only 20% of people do not go on holiday, almost 50% take their holidays in Britain and 30% go abroad.
